Uses of Interface
com.cyc.kb.Fact

  • Packages that use Fact 
    Package Description
    com.cyc.kb
    Provides basic interfaces for manipulating CycL-based java objects, both for the purpose of making assertions and for retrieving terms and values via simple queries.
    com.cyc.kb.client
    The implementation of various interfaces specified in com.cyc.kb, refer to that package for a more detailed discussion of using the API.

    • Uses of Fact in com.cyc.kb

      Subinterfaces of Fact in com.cyc.kb 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      interface  TypeFact
      The interface for Facts that are implicitly quantified over the instances of a KBCollection.
      Methods in com.cyc.kb that return Fact 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Fact KBObject.addArg1(BinaryPredicate binPred, Object arg1, Context ctx)
      Adds a new Fact in ctx using binPred, with arg1 as the first argument, and this as the second argument.
      Fact KBObject.addArg2(BinaryPredicate binPred, Object arg2, Context ctx)
      Adds a new Fact in ctx using binPred, with this as the first argument, and arg2 as the second argument.
      Fact KBObject.addComment(String comment, Context ctx)
      Add a new comment for this in the context specified
      Fact KBObject.addComment(String comment, String ctx)
      Add a new comment for this in the context specified
      Fact KBObject.addFact(Context ctx, KBPredicate pred, int thisArgPos, Object... otherArgs)
      finds or creates a new Fact in the underlying KB
      Fact KBObject.getFact(Context ctx, KBPredicate pred, int thisArgPos, Object... otherArgs)
      find the specific existing Fact, in ctx, that has pred as its predicate, this in the thisArgPos argument position, and otherArgs as its other arguments.
      Methods in com.cyc.kb that return types with arguments of type Fact 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      List<Fact> KBPredicate.getExtent() 
      List<Fact> KBPredicate.getExtent(Context ctx) 
      Collection<Fact> KBObject.getFacts(KBPredicate p, int thisArgPos, Context ctx)
      gets the asserted Facts visible from ctx, using the predicate p with this at position thisArgPos of the Fact

    • Uses of Fact in com.cyc.kb.client

      Classes in com.cyc.kb.client that implement Fact 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  FactImpl
      A fact object is an assertion with a variable-free sentence with no conjunctions or operators (a ground atomic formula), and a facade for #$CycLGAFAssertion.
      class  TypeFactImpl
      THIS CLASS IS NOT SUPPORTED IN KB API 1.0.
      Methods in com.cyc.kb.client that return Fact 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Fact KBObjectImpl.addArg1(BinaryPredicate binPred, Object arg1, Context ctx)

      Methods in com.cyc.kb.client that return types with arguments of type Fact 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      List<Fact> KBPredicateImpl.getExtent() 
      List<Fact> KBPredicateImpl.getExtent(Context ctx) 
      Collection<Fact> KBObjectImpl.getFacts(KBPredicate p, int thisArgPos, Context ctx) 
      protected Collection<Fact> KBObjectImpl.getFacts(KBPredicate pred, KBObject matchArg, int matchArgPos, Context ctx)
      Gets the asserted facts visible from ctx, using the predicate pred, with matchArg at the position matchArgPos of the fact.
